thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Shivam

author: Shivam
title: Shivam
text: Having come off a extremely trying and frustrating experience with a different real estate management agency I consolidated our investment properties under Nelson Alexander. Shannon immediately proved to be an absolute star. She was proactive in giving advice to lift the property in a systematic and phased approach all within our budget. Not only did she source competitive Quote: s and manage contractors over the Christmas period, but immediately increased the rental value by 10%. She embodies what we didn't realise a real estate agent could bring to the table.
